import React, { useState } from 'react' import uniquid from 'uniqid'; function AddUser(){ const [name, setname] = useState(''); const [email, setemail] = useState(''); const [phone, setphone] = useState(''); function addUser(){ var user = { name: name, email: email, phone, phone, userId: uniquid() } console.log(user) axios.post('api/user/adduser', user) } return(
